TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=cocomaor
TagDefinition.title: Geographic AoR
TagDefinition.description: The Geographic AoR field specifies the asset's Area of Responsibility (AoR), the geographic COCOM in which the asset operates.

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=geolocation
TagDefinition.title: Geolocation
TagDefinition.description: The Geolocation field specifies the non-DoD specific representation of the current operating geographical location.

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=cndsp
TagDefinition.title: CND Service Provider
TagDefinition.description: The Computer Network Defense Service Provider (CNDSP) for the asset. Also known as Computer Emergency Response Teams (CERT) and Network Operations and Security Centers (NOSC).

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=ccsafa
TagDefinition.title: Owning CC/S/A/FA
TagDefinition.description: The Owning CC/S/A/FA Service group specifies the CC/S/A/FA that owns the assets.

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=ownorg
TagDefinition.title: Owning Unit
TagDefinition.description: The Owning Unit group specifies unit whose ADPE account on which the device is carried.

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=adminorg
TagDefinition.title: Administration Unit
TagDefinition.description: The Administration Unit group specifies the unit that is responsible for administering the asset (e.g. the unit the system administrator belongs to).

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=adminpoc
TagDefinition.title: Administration POC
TagDefinition.description: The Administration PoC group specifies the Point of Contact (PoC) information for reaching the unit or person responsible to the DoD for the administration of the device.

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=maclevel
TagDefinition.title: MAC Level
TagDefinition.description: The MAC Level field specifies the Mission Assurance Category (MAC) level of the device. MAC levels are defined in DoDI 8500.2.

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=confidentialitylevel
TagDefinition.title: Confidentiality Level
TagDefinition.description: The Confidentiality Level field specifies the confidentiality level of the device. Confidentiality levels are defined in DoDI 8500.2.

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=pmomanaged
TagDefinition.title: PMO Managed
TagDefinition.description: The PMO Managed field specifies whether or not changes to the device's configuration are governed by a centralized program management office. If this is checked, the asset is governed by a centralized program management office.

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=systemaffiliation
TagDefinition.title: System Affiliations
TagDefinition.description: The System Affiliation refers to the system accreditation boundary that the device was certified in. System names are to match those reported in the DoD IT Program Registry (DITPR)

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=operationalaccreditation
TagDefinition.title: Operational Accreditation
TagDefinition.description: TBD

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=typeaccreditation
TagDefinition.title: Type Accreditation
TagDefinition.description: TBD

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=dodnetwork
TagDefinition.title: DoD Network
TagDefinition.description: The DoD Network field specifies the name of network that the asset operates on.

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=nondodnetwork
TagDefinition.title: Non-DoD Network
TagDefinition.description: The Non-DoD Network field specifies the non-DoD specific name of the network on which this asset operates. (e.g. Internet)

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=ccsd
TagDefinition.title: CCSD
TagDefinition.description: The CCSD field specifies the Control Communications Service Designator (CCSD) for the asset. (A CCSD is a DoD-specific circuit designator assigned and tracked by DISA.)

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=nondodcircuitid
TagDefinition.title: Non-DoD Circuit Id
TagDefinition.description: The Non-DoD Circuit Id field specifies the non-DoD specific network circuit identifier for the circuit the asset uses as its primary communication path.

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=role
TagDefinition.title: Roles
TagDefinition.description: Roles are the high-level purpose of the asset.

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=function
TagDefinition.title: Functions
TagDefinition.description: Functions are the specific implemented activities the device performs within its overall roles.

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=classification
TagDefinition.title: Classifications
TagDefinition.description: TBD

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=cndserviceprovider
TagDefinition.title: CND Service Provider
TagDefinition.description: There is also a CNDSP as an alternate rollup of the organization nametype. Is this redundant or are there intentionally two of these.

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=fipsavailabilitylevel
TagDefinition.title: FIPS Availability Level
TagDefinition.description: TBD

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=fipsconfidentialitylevel
TagDefinition.title: FIPS Confidentiality Level
TagDefinition.description: TBD

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=fipsintegritylevel
TagDefinition.title: FIPS Integrity Level
TagDefinition.description: TBD

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=networkzone
TagDefinition.title: Network Zone
TagDefinition.description: TBD

TagDefinition.name: https://dpms.disa.mil?name=permission
TagDefinition.title: Permissions
TagDefinition.description: TBD
